product_name: Badger All-Natural Face and Body Sunscreen Stick - SPF 30
long_description: Badger All-Natural Face and Body sunscreen stick blocks UVA and UVB rays while moisturizing your skin. It's perfect for your face, ears, nose and lips! Formula features micronized zinc oxide for broad spectrum protection from UVA and UVB rays; provides SPF 30 protection. Designed to protect skin from sun, wind, cold and water. Stick form allows easily application to small areas such as your nose, ears and lips. Stick fits easily in a hand bag or backpack pocket.
short_description: Badger All-Natural Face and Body sunscreen stick blocks UVA and UVB rays while moisturizing your skin. It's perfect for your face, ears, nose and lips!
